attributes.background: Boris Johnson has shown his incompetence especially in regards to handling the COVID-19 corona virus outbreak, therefore I believe he must be appropriately removed from office.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for anyone to be sacked.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that. 

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
